Extract terms related to subjects

extract_related_terms.Rd

Extract terms related to subjects

extract_related_terms(v, subjects)

Arguments

v

Text vector or annotated data frame.

subjects

Vector containing subjects.

Examples

# \donttest{
extract_related_terms(US_News_Conferences_1960_1980[1:2, 3],
                      subjects = extract_subjects(US_News_Conferences_1960_1980[1:2, 3]))
#> $brother
#> [1] "general"    "department" "white"      "house"      "justice"   
#> [6] "attorney"   "brother"    "can"
